item.title: AWS account security
item.description: Securing AWS Env Deploying an infra, is almost pretty straight forward now a days. There are multiple tools which helps you to automate the things and manage it in better way and update regularly. But talking about the data transport, many people take about the account and data security. If you re setting up an infra on AWS, you might be interested in implement following things to make you AWS infra more secure
